0.text: Bug 126953  property editor to show the entire path for all file extentions..

1.text: Right now, outline view shows the entire path of a file name, which is very long and takes much space.

2.text: Instead, only file names should be used in outline view.

3.text: If user has given a title to the file type (.rptdesign, .rptlibrary, .rpttemplate)that particular title should be shown in outline view.

4.text: If there is no title given then the saved file name should be shown.

5.text: The mouse hover on the 'node' will prompt the entire path.

6.text: Additionally, properties editor under general category of the node should show the path of the file as read only.
